notes: Applies to vehicle manufacturers (OEMs) for type approval of vehicles in categories M, N, O, and L with electronic control units
Tier 1/2 suppliers must support OEM CSMS requirements; OEMs responsible for supply chain cybersecurity
R155 applies to type approval, not vehicle operation; fleet operators are end users
Component manufacturers (ECUs, sensors, connectivity modules) indirectly affected through OEM requirements
Telematics and connected services providers may be affected through backend server security requirements
R155 is specific to vehicle type approval; financial services not in scope
R155 is specific to vehicle type approval; healthcare not in scope
R155 is specific to vehicle type approval; energy sector not in scope (though EV charging infrastructure has separate requirements)
